name: Hot Chilli Space
description:
Story

Our main character is the single Turkish person who is gone to the Space with Ellen Mask. After a while he starts to missing Turkey. He decides to go back. But he should earn money to do this.

Controls

Movement - w,a,s,d keys

Actions "Deliver Scene" (deliver order) - press space

Goals

Your main goal is to earn enough money

Specific Level Goals

[ Deliver Scene ]

- Be careful about hitting people. If you do that Darth Vader will chase you.

- If there is a red arrow try to reach that.

- Time will be getting short. So hurry up.

[Chef Scene]

- Prepare the random orders.

- Don't make the ingredients burn.

- If you do 3 mistakes, game over.
